mapper.select: SELECT pbno, title, userid, stack, wno, type, state, (SELECT namekor FROM wine WHERE promotion_banner.wno=wine.wno) as namekor, (SELECT nickname FROM wine_member WHERE promotion_banner.userid=wine_member.userid) as nickName FROM promotion_banner WHERE userid LIKE '%'||#{id}||'%' AND state=0 ORDER BY pbno ASC

SELECT pbno, title, userid, stack, wno, type, TO_CHAR(startdate, 'YY-MM-DD') as startDay, state, (SELECT namekor FROM wine WHERE promotion_banner.wno=wine.wno) as namekor, (SELECT nickname FROM wine_member WHERE promotion_banner.userid=wine_member.userid) as nickName FROM promotion_banner WHERE userid LIKE '%'||#{id}||'%' AND state=1 ORDER BY pbno ASC

SELECT pbno, pb.userid, pb.stack, pb.wno, pb.type, w.namekor, w.poster, wm.nickName , w.price, w.type as wtype FROM promotion_banner pb JOIN wine w ON pb.wno=w.wno JOIN wine_member wm ON pb.userid=wm.userId WHERE pb.type=1 AND pb.state=1
